## MongoDBRepository.findOneBySlug() method

Find a doc by its slug

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findOneBySlug(slug: string, options?: Options): Promise<IDocumentResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  slug | string | The slug to match |
|  options | Options | <i>(Optional)</i> Data source options |

<b>Returns:</b>
